messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
I guess I'll check{~N}that alley again.{~E}
The first picture that Cheryl{~N}drew in the sketchbook that I{~N}gave on her 5th birthday.{~E}
Probably a doghouse,{~N}though I'm not sure{~N}since there's no dog around.
{~C2}House key{~C7} was hidden{~N}in the dog house. Take it?{~S4}
No reason to search{~N}the school anymore.{~E}
There's a keyhole{~N}on the control panel.{~E}
The machinery is running.{~N}Do you want to press the switch?{~S4}
The street is blocked.{~N}Can't get out of town through here.{~E}
My car...{~N}too banged up to drive.
Hmm... the lock is worn out.
I may be able to break it{~N}if I hit it hard.{~E}
Something is written on the map{~N}hanging on the wall.
Something is written on the map{~N}hanging on the wall.{~E}
There's a TV set.{~N}The power must be out.{~N}It doesn't work.{~E}
The garage door is smeared{~N}with blood.{~E}
There is no gasoline.{~N}Can't use it.{~E}
There is no gasoline.{~N}Can't use it.{~E}
This must be that water works{~N}Lisa was talking about.{~E}
